content.question: Which statement correctly indicates the cell that is able to more efficiently exchange materials with the external environment and provides a correct explanation?

choices.label: The egg cell, because it has the smallest surface-to-volume ratio.
The egg cell, because it has the largest surface-to-volume ratio.
The bacterial cell, because it has the smallest surface-to-volume ratio.
The bacterial cell, because it has the largest surface-to-volume ratio.

content.answer: The bacterial cell, because it has the largest surface-to-volume ratio.
